SELECT Q.QA_NO , Q.C_NO , Q.M_NO , Q.QA_TITLE , Q.QA_CONTENT , Q.QA_STEP , Q.QA_GROUP_ID , Q.QA_REGDATE
, M.M_NO AS "memberVO.mNo" , M.M_ID AS "memberVO.mId" , M.M_NAME AS "memberVO.mName" , M.PWD AS "memberVO.pwd" , M.M_NICKNAME AS "memberVO.mNickname" , M.PHONE AS "memberVO.phone" , M.BDAY AS "memberVO.bday" , M.M_ZIPCODE AS "memberVO.mZipcode" , M.M_ADDRESS AS "memberVO.mAddress" , M.M_ADDRESS_DETAIL AS "memberVO.mAddressDetail" , M.REGDATE AS "memberVO.regdate" , M.M_GRADE AS "memberVO.mGrade" , M.M_ORIGINALNAME AS "memberVO.mOriginalname" , M.M_FILESIZE AS "memberVO.mFilesize" , M.M_FILENAME AS "memberVO.mFilename" , M.DELFLAG AS "memberVO.delflag" FROM QA Q INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.M_NO = Q.M_NO WHERE 1=1
AND C_NO = #{cNo}
ORDER BY Q.QA_REGDATE DESC
